description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 2 iterations of function f(x) = 8x + 3.
comments: n, 8*n+3 and 64*n+27 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..100000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(8*n+3) and IsPrime(64*n+27)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
